a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: Hey! Why are you here? This is some serious business, so get out.

a1.speaker: Raiko:
a1.dialogue: Well, you are the one that is supposed to get out!

a2.speaker: Raiko:
a2.dialogue: My little cousin will absolve all of this sinful land, making it fit to see the coming of God.

a3.speaker: Reimu:
a3.dialogue: We have seen God in Gensokyo twice to be exact.

a5.speaker: Raiko:
a5.dialogue: This is God's ultimate coming to the land for purifying the hearts of its people and make them God's adoptive Children!
